snippet: Lockheed Martin Corp expects to sign a contract with the U.S. government early this summer for 43 more F-35 fighter jets, but the deal is unlikely to match price reductions seen on the last few contracts, a top company executive said Monday....

headline.print_headline: Lockheed Sees Next U.S. F-35 Fighter Contract Early This Summer
headline.main: Lockheed Sees Next U.S. F-35 Fighter Contract Early This Summer

lead_paragraph: Lockheed Martin Corp expects to sign a contract with the U.S. government early this summer for 43 more F-35 fighter jets, but the deal is unlikely to match price reductions seen on the last few contracts, a top company executive said Monday.
